title: Effect of fluorine on the photovoltaic properties of 2,1,3-benzothiadiazole-based alternating conjugated polymers by changing the position and number of fluorine atoms
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11659-11667
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01104J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pengzhi Guo, Xuemei Gan, Sheng Guan, Peili Gao, Qian Wang, Furong Shi, Yuan Zhou, Chenglong Wang, Yangjun Xia
Incorporation of fluorine atoms in conjugated polymers leads to an increase in charge mobility and dielectric constant, increasing the Pdiss value and power conversion efficiency and open circuit voltage of polymer bulk heterojunction photovoltaic cells.
